Uses of Package
zipkin.junit

  • Classes in zipkin.junit used by zipkin.junit 
    Class Description
    HttpFailure
    Instrumentation that uses the POST /api/v1/spans endpoint needs to survive failures.
    ZipkinRule
    Starts up a local Zipkin server, listening for http requests on ZipkinRule.httpUrl().
